content: येन {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (Strictly <ab>instr.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> of यद used adverbially) {@--1@} Whereby, by which, wherefore, on which account, by means of which; किं तद्येन मनो हर्तुमलं स्यातां न शृण्वतां <ls>R. 15. 64</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 74.</ls> {@--2@} So that; दर्शय तं चौरसिंहं येन व्यापादयामि <ls>Pt. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Since, because.
